title: Codestar: Advanced Programming Fast-Track
description: Achieved an exceptional milestone by completing a comprehensive 6-month Fundamentals of Programming and Advanced Algorithms course in just 1 month. This record-breaking fast-track completion demonstrates extraordinary learning speed and mastery of core concepts. The curriculum focused on C++ Mastery, Advanced Data Structures, and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP). Successfully applied Design Patterns and Competitive Programming techniques to solve complex algorithmic challenges, finishing significantly ahead of schedule with top-tier performance.
